invitedTo.description: DID of the VTC/VTN the invitee is being invited to.

inviter.description: DID of the inviter/authorizer (may differ from VC issuer).

inviteNonce.description: Nonce to prevent replay and bind acceptance to a specific invitation.

validFrom.description: RFC3339 timestamp when this invitation becomes valid.

validUntil.description: RFC3339 timestamp when this invitation expires.

terms.description: Reference to terms/policy governing acceptance (DID or URI).

title: VIC (Invitation Credential)
description: Authorizes a prospective member to join a VTC or VTN when presented to the VTA/PEP.
